long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Pacman is a classic arcade game that has been enjoyed by generations of gamers, and now you can play it right from your Chrome browser with the Pacman extension. This extension allows you to play the game whenever you want, without having to navigate away from your current tab or window.

The Pacman extension is simple to install and easy to use, with intuitive controls that make it easy to navigate the iconic yellow character through the maze while collecting dots and avoiding ghosts. The game even features the classic sound effects and graphics that fans of the original game will love.

Whether you're taking a break from work or just looking for a fun way to pass the time, the Pacman extension for Chrome is a great way to enjoy this timeless game right from your browser. So why not add some classic gaming fun to your day with the Pacman extension?
